articles.title: Jusuf Nurkic makes last-second putback to lift the Jazz past the Celtics, 105-103
articles.description:
Brown led Boston with 36 points, but was 0 for 9 from the 3-point line. Boston shot a season-low 21.6% (11 of 51) from beyond the arc.

The post Jusuf Nurkic makes last-second putback to lift the Jazz past the Celtics, 105-103 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics lost to the Jazz 105-103 on November 3, 2025.
Jaylen Brown scored 36 points but missed all 9 three-point attempts.
Boston's three-point shooting at 21.6% marks a season low.

articles.title: Voting guide: Here’s what voters need to know before Boston’s Tuesday election
articles.description:
Polls across the city will be open between 7 a.m. and 8 p.m. in the city's 275 voting precincts. While Mayor Michelle Wu is running unopposed, most of the City Council races are contested.

The post Voting guide: Here’s what voters need to know before Boston’s Tuesday election appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Polls open from 7 a.m. to 8 p.m. on Tuesday across 275 precincts.
Mayor Michelle Wu runs unopposed; City Council races feature multiple contested seats.
Voter participation will influence local governance and community representation in Boston.

articles.title: The Bruins’ second line is looking like a difference-maker, in more ways than one
articles.description:
"I could sit and pout about it, but what's that really gonna do for me?"

The post The Bruins’ second line is looking like a difference-maker, in more ways than one appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins' second line shows improved performance in recent games, boosting team morale.
Pavel Zacha and Viktor Arvidsson contribute significantly to scoring, enhancing offensive strategy.
Increased productivity from the second line may lead to higher attendance at home games.
